casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Benjamin GATTI. No. 678P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2006. Joan M. Cunningham, Assistant Attorney General, Michael Parker, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of May 2006 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal, (Alternately Petition for Discretionary Review), (Alternately Petition for Writ of Certiorari):

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of August 2006."
